events.message: I recently received my order, but the item is not what I expected and I want to request a refund as soon as possible because it does not meet my needs.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back on the incorrect order they received.
An agent has been assigned to the refund case to handle the customer's request and facilitate the return process.
Hello! I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and details about the issue with the item?
To proceed with your refund, could you kindly send us photos of the product and confirm if it was unopened or damaged on arrival?
Thank you for your quick response. Here is my order number 99887766, and the item did arrive unopened but it is the wrong color than what I ordered.
We can process a full refund for you or offer an exchange with the correct color shipped immediately. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer to receive the refund, thank you. Please let me know the next steps for returning the product.
Your refund request has been approved. We have sent you a prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the item, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the prepaid label and whether you have sent back the item for refund processing.
Yes, I have sent the package back this morning via the courier. Thank you for your assistance throughout the process.
We have processed your refund successfully and the amount should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your refund experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
